snippet.title: A Towers Will Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A Tower's Will is a 3D platformer about climbing a sentient tower that doesn't want to be climbed.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3102100/A_Towers_Will/

Prepare yourself to scale a kilometer-high tower filled with treacherous obstacles, each more deadly than the next.

The game saves your progress continuously, eliminating the need for manual saves and ensuring every step counts.

Immerse yourself in an unexpected journey with a living tower, as she communicates through a vast array of sentences displayed on her walls. Featuring over 1000 unique sentences reflecting moods such as irony, despair, anger, boredom, and much more, you will be drawn into a battle of wits and willpower as you strive to conquer the tower's formidable challenges, all while enduring her relentless provocations.

Will you rise victorious or tumble down in defeat?
